articles.title: Galaxy S26 Ultra Could Take Significantly Less Time In Fully Charging Its Battery When Plugged, With New Rumor Claiming That 80 Percent Of Its Total Charge Can Be Reached In Just 30 Minutes - Wccftech
articles.description: A rumor claims that thanks to adopting improved fast charging technology, the Galaxy S26 Ultra’s battery could reach 80 percent in just half an hour
articles.content: A battery upgrade is not in the cards for the Galaxy S26 Ultra, making it yet another launch where Samsung has prevented its top-end offering from competing with rivals in this specific category. For… [+1885 chars]
